summary: Dreamer - Real Performance ENB For Low End PC
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][b]
[center][img]http://s8.postimg.org/637b986xh/image.png[/img][/center][center][/center]
[/b][/color][center][i]It's my personal presets. If you like, endorse :D

[color=#00ff00]> Dreamer v2 Available (Main Files) <[/color][/i][/center]
[center][img]http://s3.postimg.org/57elm97w3/how.png[/img][/center][center][color=#ffd966][b]1)[/b][/color] Go to [url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0112.htm]http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0112.htm[/url] , download and extract only "d3d9.dll"
   from "Wrapper" folder to your Skyrim main folder.

[color=#ffd966][b]2)[/b][/color] Copy all files from "Main Files" folder to your Skyrim main folder.

[color=#ffd966][b]3)[/b][/color] You're free to edit this preset as you wish.

[color=#ffd966][b]4)[/b][/color] [color=#6aa84f](Optional)[/color] If you want, use my Skyrim INI's for performance and quality.
     Open the SkyrimPrefs.ini and edit this line: sD3DDevice="Your Device Name Here"

[color=#ffd966][b]5)[/b][/color] Enjoy![/center][center]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/zY73cMk.png[/img]
[img]http://s21.postimg.org/w90oen6t3/recom.png[/img]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50065/]• Natural Lighting and Atmospherics for ENB[/url] (Use only the ESP File in Data Folder)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73937/?][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73937/?]• Vivid Weathers[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13049/]• IMAGINATOR - Visual Control Device for Skyrim[/url]
[i](If you want cinematic effect, try in Imaginator MCM menu: "[b]Warm Desaturation[/b]" and "[b]Cool Midnight[/b]" Effects)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2581/?]Skyrim Stuttering Fix[/url] (Smooth Gameplay)
Rename the DLL Skyrim Stuttering Fix to "d3d9FL.dll" and edit your enbseries.ini:

[i][PROXY]
EnableProxyLibrary=true
InitProxyFunctions=true
ProxyLibrary=d3d9FL.dll[/i][/i]


[img]http://i.imgur.com/zY73cMk.png[/img][/center]
[center][youtube]rEddRFYciEk[/youtube]


Vídeo by: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/721555]TornFlesh[/url]
[url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCjvzSmfXpWpelRJ4cQrjLiw]Youtube Channel[/url]
[youtube]qZPY4AgE57k[/youtube][/center]

[center][color=#ff0000][b]NOTE:[/b][/color][i] If you post this ENB in external sites don't forget the credits.
[/i][/center]
